creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
inscription: {sabishisa wa/ sono iro to shi mo/ nakarikeri/ maki tatsu yama no/ aki no yugure} (Loneliness/ has no color/ on this cedar covered/ mountain/ in the autumn dusk)
medium: Hanging scroll, right of a triptych, ink and light color on silk
object_name: hanging scroll, one of a triptych
title: Landscape [right of a triptych of Three Scenes of Autumn Evening]
